channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘This is our second marriage’: We’re in our 60s. How do we split expenses if we move in together and rent one house?
item.description: “We have been taking turns living in his house and my house.”

item.title: ‘I’m spooked’: Do gold and silver belong in my retirement portfolio after their dramatic fall in value?
item.description: “Before you ask, there is nothing extreme about 5% of my ‘alternative’ assets.”

item.title: Super Micro logs record revenue from AI demand, and the stock surges
item.description: Super Micro’s revenue exploded to $12.7 billion as delayed orders finally materialized, but aggressive competition and rising costs pushed gross margi...

item.title: Chase cut my credit-card limit due to lower usage. Will this affect my credit score and lead other banks to do the same?
item.description: “I’m wondering whether this could cause a ripple effect in which other banks might do the same with my lesser-used credit cards.”

item.title: Oracle’s monster $25 billion debt financing points to anxieties around AI funding
item.description: Oracle plans to raise up to another $25 billion this year but said the sales would be either equity or equity-linked issuances.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
